Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://cityofcactus.org/AgendaCenter)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [City Commission](https://cityofcactus.org/193/City-Commission)

   The City of Cactus Commission is a small governing board held by our elected officials.
3. #### [Departments](https://cityofcactus.org/192/Departments)

   Get information regarding the departments dedicated to keeping the community moving.
4. #### [Documents](https://cityofcactus.org/203/Documents)

   Important documents can be found on this page.

### Contact Us

1. **City of Cactus**  
   201 S Highway 287  
   Cactus, Texas 79013

   **Phone:**[806-966-5458](tel:806-966-5458)

   **Hours:**  
   Monday through Friday  
   8 am to 5 pm  
   Saturday through Sunday  
   Closed
